name: Oasis Park
description: A lush public park with walking trails, gardens, and a large playground. Perfect for families and outdoor enthusiasts.

name: Riverbank Museum
description: A local museum showcasing the history, art, and culture of the region. Features interactive exhibits for all ages.

name: Golden Market
description: A vibrant farmer's market open every weekend, offering fresh produce, crafts, and local delicacies.

name: Desert Botanical Garden
description: Explore a wide variety of desert plants and themed gardens. Guided tours and educational programs available.

name: Blue Lake Marina
description: A scenic marina offering boat rentals, fishing, and lakeside dining. Popular for water sports and picnics.

name: Nomad Art Gallery
description: A contemporary art gallery featuring works by local and international artists. Hosts monthly exhibitions and workshops.

name: Sahara Event Center
description: A modern venue for concerts, conferences, and community events. State-of-the-art facilities and ample parking.

name: Insta Fitness Trail
description: A well-maintained trail for running, biking, and walking. Features fitness stations and beautiful scenery.
